name: Do Nothing Simulator
description:
Most of this stuff is in the docs folder btw

1: To play, simply start the timer and keep it running for 3 hours then stop the timer

2: The game can crash anytime since it sometimes uses a BUNCHA memory.

3: To open, find WinFormsApp3.exe in WinFormsApp3/WinFormsApp3/bin/Release (debug if you want)/net5.0-windows.
